name: UGJ: Rate of Decay
description:
My Entry to the UGJ! 

This is Rate of Decay,  a game where Decay is very important (not just because that was the Game Jam theme). In Rate of Decay you play as a plant warrior who must survive an onslaught of enemies who are trying to destroy you.

Your life will continually go down so be sure to watch it, but look out for the water cloud which provides you a chance to gain some life back!

I hope you enjoy the game.

I could definitely do better and had more to add I just got caught up in University and some good but unforeseen events!

Good luck to everyone!

Disclaimer: Highscore may not reset (you will see on start screen) if that is the case apologies but please click reset button!
